errors.invalid_user_id: **{{id}}** is not a valid user Id.
errors.no_user_found: The given user does not exist.
errors.no_guild: This command can only be used in a guild.
errors.target_not_found: The given member is not in this guild.

errors.missing_permissions: Missing permissions to kick this member.

errors.too_long: Query too broad, too many results.

errors.fetch: Error while trying to fetch GitHub API information.
errors.args_missing:
Missing arguments, correct usage: 
• `github <owner> <repository> <issue>` 
• `github <alias> <issue>`
• `github alias <add|remove> <...alias>`
• `github alias list`
errors.no_token: Could not access GitHub token to use.
errors.invalid_owner: Please provide a valid GitHub owner.
errors.invalid_repository: Please provide a valid GitHub repository.
errors.invalid_issue: Please provide a valid issue number.

errors.no_current: This guild does not have any repository aliases enabled at this time.

errors.no_args: Please provide valid repository aliases to add. Valid format: {{- format}}. Also make sure the desired alias does not already exist.

add.no_add: No new repository aliases were added.
add.title: The following repository aliases have been enabled on this guild:

errors.no_args: Please provide valid repository aliases to remove. Valid format: {{- format}}.

remove.no_remove: No repository aliases have been removed.
remove.title: The following repository aliases have been disabled on this guild:

list.title: The following repository aliases are enabled on this guild:

errors.not_found: Could not find a commit based on {{expression}} on the repository {{owner}}/{{repository}}.
Could not find issue {{issue}} on the repository {{owner}}/{{repository}}.
